info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 4:01PM PDT until August 18 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 401 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across Spring Mountain Ranch State Park and Red Rock Canyon. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Red Rock Canyon, Blue Diamond, Spring Mountain Ranch and Rocky Gap Campground. This includes the following roads... State Route 159 in Red Rock Canyon between mile marker 4 and 10. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
